item.title: Major Oil Leaders To Discuss Venezuela Investments With White House As Early As Thursday: Report
item.description: As per a Reuters report that cited sources familiar with the planning, the details and timing of the meeting are yet to be finalized.

item.title: CRML Shares In Spotlight After Surging Over 251% In Six Months — Why Is Retail Still Bullish?
item.description: Retail investors are optimistic around the company’s strategic Greenland Tanbreez rare earth asset.

item.title: Meta Appoints Former Trump Official And Microsoft Veteran As Its New Legal Chief: Report
item.description: Mahoney is set to start on Wednesday and will report directly to CEO Mark Zuckerberg.

item.title: Comerica Shareholders Back $10.9 Billion Merger Deal With Fifth Third Bancorp: Report
item.description: 97% of Comerica shareholders voted for the merger deal with Fifth Third Bancorp in a preliminary tally, according to Reuters.

item.title: Dow Hits Record High Despite Venezuela Risk, Bolstered By Tech, Healthcare
item.description: The Dow futures rose over 0.9%, to reach a new all-time high of 49,704.00.
